title: Plotting Categorical Data with Matplotlib
description: Matplotlib is a popular data visualization library in Python. It provides a variety of customizable plots and graphs for data exploration and presentation. In this lab, we will learn how to plot categorical variables using Matplotlib.

meta.title: Plotting Categorical Data with Matplotlib
meta.description: Learn how to create customizable plots and graphs for data exploration and presentation using Matplotlib, a popular data visualization library in Python.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, data visualization, categorical data, plotting
